question: what is unity?
response:
Based on the provided context, Unity is a collaborative research computing platform with multiple member institutions [[1]](https://docs.unity.rc.umass.edu/about/). It is a high-performance computing (HPC) cluster located at the Massachusetts Green High Performance Computing Center (MGHPCC) [[3]](https://docs.unity.rc.umass.edu/documentation/).

Unity is under active development and primarily supports research activities. The partnering institutions currently include UMass Amherst, University of Rhode Island, UMass Dartmouth, UMass Lowell, UMass Boston, and Mount Holyoke College [[3]](https://docs.unity.rc.umass.edu/documentation/).

As of late 2024, Unity is an over 25,000 core cluster based on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS and Slurm with a heterogeneous network containing ethernet and IB linked compute nodes. It hosts a variety of compute node architectures, primarily Intel or AMD x86-64 nodes, with some ARM and Power9 nodes. Additionally, Unity contains approximately 1300 Nvidia GPUs, including over 100 A100, L40S, and V100 GPUs [[1]](https://docs.unity.rc.umass.edu/about/).
comments: I think this response is helpful.

question: Hi, What is Unity?
response:
Unity is a collaborative multi-institutional high-performance computing (HPC) platform located at the Massachusetts Green High Performance Computing Center (MGHPCC) [[2]](https://docs.unity.rc.umass.edu/documentation/), [[5]](https://docs.unity.rc.umass.edu/). It supports primarily research activities and is a collaborative research computing platform with various member institutions [[1]](https://docs.unity.rc.umass.edu/about/), [[5]](https://docs.unity.rc.umass.edu/).

As of late 2024, Unity is an over 25,000 core cluster based on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS and Slurm with a heterogeneous network containing ethernet and IB linked compute nodes [[1]](https://docs.unity.rc.umass.edu/about/).

The partnering institutions currently include:
- UMass Amherst
- University of Rhode Island
- UMass Dartmouth
- UMass Lowell
- UMass Boston
- Mount Holyoke College [[2]](https://docs.unity.rc.umass.edu/documentation/), [[5]](https://docs.unity.rc.umass.edu/)
